title: Learning Research-Based Project for Strengthening Fraction Learning and Teacher Knowledge-Sharing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing collaborative knowledge sharing via small-group learning and peer assessment systems in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the scientific concepts of decimals with 90% accuracy
Learners can effectively transfer acquired knowledge to at least three peers through role-playing as fellow teachers
Learners can design and execute knowledge-sharing protocols in PBL environments to improve peer concept comprehension scores by 20% or more

resources: Visualization Materials for Prime Number Concepts
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
